page.title: 06 EMPLOYMENT IN LITCHAM
page.content: The school is the main employer in this area.It employs 34 teachers;22 fulltime and 5 part time.It also employs 9 ancillary staff for jobs like cleaners and secretaries.It also affects other jobs in Litcham i.e the local coach company.It also has a marginal affect on local grocery and butchers shops.There are many different small shops in the area which employ 2-5 people each. Another main source of employment in East Anglia,is farming.However,the need for the farm labourer has decreased dramatically since farm machinery became popular.This has meant a slight move towards office jobs in larger towns,or even self-employment.The recession,however,has taken its toll.
